author: @SirCorrino
text: You didn't find the inside corner of the 'e' because it was too close to the corner on the opposite side. Also, if you set the quality to for example 0.1 instead of 0.01 you don't get the false positives from the aliasing. With quality 0.1 and minDistance 5 you catch every actual corner in the sample you used.
